notifications.usageThresholdReached: プレミアムリクエストの使用量が{percentage}%に達しました

notifications.usageBasedSpendingThreshold: 使用量ベースの支出が${limit}の制限の{percentage}%に達しました
notifications.failedToOpenSettings: Cursor Statsの設定を開けませんでした。VS Codeの設定を手動で開いてみてください。
notifications.smartUsageMonitorAlert: ⚠️ High usage detected: {usageChange}% increase in {timeMinutes} minutes (monitoring every {interval} queries)
notifications.smartUsageMonitorDetail: Current settings: {threshold}% usage change threshold, checking every {interval} queries. If you didn't intentionally use AI heavily, check if you selected the wrong model.
notifications.checkCurrentModel: 💡 Please check if you've selected the correct AI model. Accidentally choosing a high-consumption model (like GPT-4) could quickly drain your quota.
